name: Django-parakeet
tagline: Simple chat application for django. Inspired by ideas from slack. Built as experiment with django-channels and django-tastypie.
body:
### Ideas of the project.
This application is built as experiment of using django-channels for websocket-based chat application in django.
Frontend is written with backbonejs, handlebars, browserify and bootstrap

### Some screenshots:
![Screenshot 1](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/emakarov/django-parakeet/master/djparakeet/static/pagescontent/screenshot1.png)
![Screenshot 2](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/emakarov/django-parakeet/master/djparakeet/static/pagescontent/screenshot2.png)

### How to use
- Install from git repository
- Migrate application djparakeet
- Add privileges to users (to read/edit/delete djparakeet Topic and Message)
- Add to urls:   
`    
url(r'^parakeet/', include('djparakeet.urls')),
`
- Navigate to /parakeet/

### Roadmap
- better documentation
- private channels
- channels-groups of users
- packaging for pip
- search
- image upload
